And<S>2532</S> after<S>3326</S> these things<S>5023</S> I saw<S>1492</S> four<S>5064</S> angels<S>32</S> standing<S>2476</S> on<S>1909</S> the four<S>5064</S> corners<S>1137</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, holding<S>2902</S> the four<S>5064</S> winds<S>417</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>, that<S>3363</S> the wind<S>417</S> should<S>4154</S> not<S>3363</S> blow<S>4154</S> on<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, nor<S>3383</S> on<S>1909</S> the sea<S>2281</S>, nor<S>3383</S> on<S>1909</S> any<S>3956</S> tree<S>1186</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> another<S>243</S> angel<S>32</S> ascending<S>305</S> <S>305</S> from<S>575</S> the east<S>395</S> <S>2246</S>, having<S>2192</S> the seal<S>4973</S> of the living<S>2198</S> God<S>2316</S>: and<S>2532</S> he cried<S>2896</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S> to the four<S>5064</S> angels<S>32</S>, to whom<S>3739</S> it<S>846</S> was given<S>1325</S> to hurt<S>91</S> the earth<S>1093</S> and<S>2532</S> the sea<S>2281</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, Hurt<S>91</S> not<S>3361</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, neither<S>3383</S> the sea<S>2281</S>, nor<S>3383</S> the trees<S>1186</S>, till<S>891</S> <S>3739</S> we have sealed<S>4972</S> <S>4972</S> the servants<S>1401</S> of our<S>2257</S> God<S>2316</S> in<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> foreheads<S>3359</S>.
And<S>2532</S> I heard<S>191</S> the number<S>706</S> of them which were sealed<S>4972</S>: and there were sealed<S>4972</S> an hundred<S>1540</S> and forty<S>5062</S> and four<S>5064</S> thousand<S>5505</S> of<S>1537</S> all<S>3956</S> the tribes<S>5443</S> of the children<S>5207</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>.
Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Juda<S>2455</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>. Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Reuben<S>4502</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>. Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Gad<S>1045</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>.
Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Aser<S>768</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>. Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Nepthalim<S>3508</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>. Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Manasses<S>3128</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>.
Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Simeon<S>4826</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>. Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Levi<S>3017</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>. Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Issachar<S>2466</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>.
Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Zabulon<S>2194</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>. Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Joseph<S>2501</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>. Of<S>1537</S> the tribe<S>5443</S> of Benjamin<S>958</S> were sealed<S>4972</S> twelve<S>1427</S> thousand<S>5505</S>.
After<S>3326</S> this<S>5023</S> I beheld<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S>, lo<S>2400</S>, a great<S>4183</S> multitude<S>3793</S>, which<S>3739</S> no man<S>3762</S> could<S>1410</S> number<S>705</S> <S>846</S>, of<S>1537</S> all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S>, and<S>2532</S> kindreds<S>5443</S>, and<S>2532</S> people<S>2992</S>, and<S>2532</S> tongues<S>1100</S>, stood<S>2476</S> before<S>1799</S> the throne<S>2362</S>, and<S>2532</S> before<S>1799</S> the Lamb<S>721</S>, clothed<S>4016</S> with white<S>3022</S> robes<S>4749</S>, and<S>2532</S> palms<S>5404</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> hands<S>5495</S>;
And<S>2532</S> cried<S>2896</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Salvation<S>4991</S> to our<S>2257</S> God<S>2316</S> which<S>3588</S> sitteth<S>2521</S> upon<S>1909</S> the throne<S>2362</S>, and<S>2532</S> unto the Lamb<S>721</S>.
And<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the angels<S>32</S> stood<S>2476</S> round about<S>2945</S> the throne<S>2362</S>, and<S>2532</S> about the elders<S>4245</S> and<S>2532</S> the four<S>5064</S> beasts<S>2226</S>, and<S>2532</S> fell<S>4098</S> before<S>1799</S> the throne<S>2362</S> on<S>1909</S> their<S>846</S> faces<S>4383</S>, and<S>2532</S> worshipped<S>4352</S> God<S>2316</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, Amen<S>281</S>: Blessing<S>2129</S>, and<S>2532</S> glory<S>1391</S>, and<S>2532</S> wisdom<S>4678</S>, and<S>2532</S> thanksgiving<S>2169</S>, and<S>2532</S> honour<S>5092</S>, and<S>2532</S> power<S>1411</S>, and<S>2532</S> might<S>2479</S>, be unto our<S>2257</S> God<S>2316</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
And<S>2532</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> the elders<S>4245</S> answered<S>611</S>, saying<S>3004</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, What<S>5101</S> are<S>1526</S> these<S>3778</S> which<S>3588</S> are arrayed in<S>4016</S> white<S>3022</S> robes<S>4749</S>? and<S>2532</S> whence<S>4159</S> came they<S>2064</S>?
And<S>2532</S> I said<S>2046</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Sir<S>2962</S>, thou<S>4771</S> knowest<S>1492</S>. And<S>2532</S> he said<S>2036</S> to me<S>3427</S>, These<S>3778</S> are they<S>1526</S> which came<S>2064</S> out of<S>1537</S> great<S>3173</S> tribulation<S>2347</S>, and<S>2532</S> have washed<S>4150</S> their<S>846</S> robes<S>4749</S>, and<S>2532</S> made<S>3021</S> them<S>4749</S> <S>846</S> white<S>3021</S> in<S>1722</S> the blood<S>129</S> of the Lamb<S>721</S>.
Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> are they<S>1526</S> before<S>1799</S> the throne<S>2362</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> serve<S>3000</S> him<S>846</S> day<S>2250</S> and<S>2532</S> night<S>3571</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> temple<S>3485</S>: and<S>2532</S> he that sitteth<S>2521</S> on<S>1909</S> the throne<S>2362</S> shall dwell<S>4637</S> among<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S>.
They shall hunger<S>3983</S> no<S>3756</S> more<S>2089</S>, neither<S>3761</S> thirst<S>1372</S> any more<S>2089</S>; neither<S>3761</S> <S>3361</S> shall<S>4098</S> the sun<S>2246</S> light<S>4098</S> on<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S>, nor<S>3761</S> any<S>3956</S> heat<S>2738</S>.
For<S>3754</S> the Lamb<S>721</S> which<S>3588</S> is in the midst<S>303</S> <S>3319</S> of the throne<S>2362</S> shall feed<S>4165</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall lead<S>3594</S> them<S>846</S> unto<S>1909</S> living<S>2198</S> fountains<S>4077</S> of waters<S>5204</S>: and<S>2532</S> God<S>2316</S> shall wipe away<S>1813</S> all<S>3956</S> tears<S>1144</S> from<S>575</S> their<S>846</S> eyes<S>3788</S>.
